name: Ole School
description:
In Development Sandbox Fantasy RPG

Current Features:

Crafting, Farming, Building. Exploration, Mercenaries, Gear Customization and upgrading, Tons of Dungeons with lots of TREASURE!!!!! Much more to come!

You start with a full farm! You can grow crops, raise chickens, raise pigs, and sacrifice goats to influence the weather! Advanced crops and animals will provide valuable and powerful items to use in battle! Cook your crops into food, or combine with wild plants to make potions and charms.

Over 35 characters to join your party and adventure! Hire mercenaries with various strengths and weaknesses to customize your group for the right situations. Hundreds of Armour and Weapons for you to find and full sets of craftable Armour for all classes. Customize your gear with upgrades enhancements and engravings to become even more powerful!

Build yourself a home in one of the towns to store your things or relax and unwind after a hard day of dungeon raiding with a well earned nap. Or sell your buildings to unlock new townspeople with new items for trade.

Explore the world around you! Explore the world map to find hidden dungeons and valuable resources! Explore the ancient ruins, forests and caves and discover the ancient and bloody history of this land.

Try valiantly to prove your worth to the Ole School Hero Academy by helping every stranger you meet until one of them coughs up a recommendation letter!

Unlock 50 player character appearances. A hero is only as good as his name!
